Difficulty Modes

Baldur's Gate 3 gives 3 different difficulty modes. Which are Balanced Mode, Explorer Mode, and Tactician Mode.

This is their normal mode. With just enough storytelling and a good amount of combat for players to experience. This is also the game mode that is available to players in the Early Access version of the game.
